name: Jellypets
description:
Congratulations! Enjoy your new jellypet!

Jellypets is a game for the Virtual Pet Jam by Team Dogpit! I opted for a traditional pet sim, like a tamagotchi. I also decided to try making it a group project, enlisting the help of my Discord friends, so it was quite a learning experience!

All controls can be remapped, but the defaults are:

Movements - Arrow keys
Select - Z
Pause - Enter
